medium: Charcoal, colored chalk, pen and ink
title: Women and Children at Ouessant
marks: Signature in black, LLC: [Chs. milcendeau/ Ouessant/ 1898]
description:
same record as L2009.150.16 cat. 37
morose-looking woman and children standing at center to R foreground; church with large cross in L background; large body of water in background
